quest.name: Building Good Habitats
journal:
 Quest Sync
The green gleaner seems to want a word with you.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: Excuse me, but aren't you the one who was assisting Erenville? If you have a moment, I could also use some help with a certain task...

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: Simply put, I'm to hunt down a number of caribou. But as this is the first job I've accepted which requires any degree of violence, I'm not entirely confident in how I should approach my prey.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: You seem like the type of womanman who's seen herhis fair share of combat─what if I could observe you from concealment while you engage my target fauna!?

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: I wouldn't need you to spend all day on it, of course─one or two examples in the forest west of here should be plenty! Let's say two, shall we? I'll even pay you! ...Please?

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: The caribou shouldn't give you too much trouble. And if they do, well...that will also teach me a valuable lesson!

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: Thank you for the instruction! While I doubt I could emulate your particular style, seeing you in action was enormously helpful.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: You've also provided a service by culling a few of Labyrinthos's more prolific animals. Lest you worry, it's essential we reduce the caribou's numbers every now and again to maintain a stable habitat.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: And nothing here is killed for mere sport. Every part of a carcass is harvested and put to use─a practice I will make sure to carry out with the creatures you slew.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: There are still a few more that need culling, but I think I can handle that on my own now. Such is the gleaner's lot, and I should learn how to do it sooner rather than later.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04186
dialogue.text: Oh, and here's your payment. Wish me luck!
